sentences.sentence: The Senate shall have the sole Power to try all Impeachments.
sentences.translation: 唯参议院具有审判一切弹劾案之权。

sentences.sentence: The Senate shall have the sole power to try all impeachments.
sentences.translation: 所有弹劾案，只有参议院有权审问。

sentences.sentence: The Senate shall have the sole power to try all impeachments.
sentences.translation: 所有弹劾案，只有参议院有权审理。
